titleStmt.title: The Church of England vindicated against her chief adversaries of the Church of Rome wherein the most material points are fairly debated, and briefly and fully answered / by a learned divine.
titleStmt.author: Menzeis, John, 1624-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C. Wilkinson, T. Dring, and C. Harper, and are to be sold at their shops in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
